I'm ready for the hard words!$h"/emote farmer 56/speak Ian "Hon, gimme a word, and I'll try to spell it!$h"/emote farmer 56/speak Ian "$q 7516228 null#What word?#$r 7516228 0 ian14_word1#Construction#$r 7516228 0 ian14_word2#Hospital#$r 7516228 0 ian14_word3#Museum"/emote farmer 56/jump Ian/emote Ian 20/speak Ian "Phew! Made it the first round!$h#$q 7516229 null#Next word?#$r 7516229 0 ian14_word4#Ridgeside Village#$r 7516229 0 ian14_word5#Pelican Town#$r 7516229 0 ian14_word6#Ginger Islands"/emote farmer 56/emote Ian 28/speak Ian "Phew!$8#$b#I managed to make it out the second round!$h"/emote farmer 32/emote Ian 60/speak Ian "Honey, you seem to be enjoying this.$8#$b#Please don't make them too hard!$8#$b#But I'll try my best anyway!$h"/emote farmer 32/speak Ian "$q 7516230 null#Next word?#$r 7516230 0 ian14_word7#Love#$r 7516230 0 ian14_word8#Forever#$r 7516230 0 ian14_word9#Chiaroscurist"/emote farmer 20/emote Ian 28/showFrame Ian 16/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 3000/emote Ian 56/speak Ian "Phew! That was exhausting!$8#$b#But I think I did alright!$h"/emote farmer 32/message "Ian is writting something..."/emote farmer 8/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 3000/speak Ian "...$8#$b#Look!$h"/move Ian -1 0 1/move farmer -1 0 2/emote farmer 8/message "You open the notebook.#It reads:#'-Ta- Thank you for -evi- everything.'"/emote farmer 60/faceDirection farmer 3/emote Ian 60/speak Ian "Yeah...$l#$b#Thank you, for everything hon.$l#$b#Thank you for being patient with me and all...$l#$b#I'm uh-am really happy I get to start my busy days waking up to your face...$l#$b#Then going home, looking forward for your hugs!$h#$b#It takes all the tiredness away.$l"/emote farmer 20/emote Ian 20/positionOffset Ian 1 0/positionOffset farmer -1 0/pause 100/positionOffset Ian 1 0/positionOffset farmer -1 0/pause 100/showFrame Ian 28/animate farmer true true 100 101/positionOffset Ian 1 0/positionOffset farmer -1 0/pause 100/positionOffset Ian 1 0/positionOffset farmer -1 0/pause 100/specificTemporarySprite heart 17 8/pause 5000/faceDirection Ian 1/faceDirection farmer 3/emote Ian 60/speak Ian "Well... Uh...$l#$b#Let's learn more words, hon?$l#$b#I want to spend more time with you.$l"/emote farmer 56/pause 1000/end dialogue Ian "Ah! My brain is tired!$h"

Entries.75160169/f Shiro 1000/t 900 1500/e 75160: ocean/19 24/farmer 24 23 3 Shiro 19 24 2/skippable/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/faceDirection Shiro 1/speak Shiro "{{i18n:event-75160169.01}}"/emote farmer 32/speak Shiro "{{i18n:event-75160169.02}}"/faceDirection Shiro 2/move farmer -4 0 2/move farmer 0 1 2/emote farmer 8/emote Shiro 56/speak Shiro "{{i18n:event-75160169.03}}"/emote farmer 8/faceDirection farmer 3/speak Shiro "{{i18n:event-75160169.04}}"/emote farmer 40/faceDirection Shiro 1/speak Shiro "{{i18n:event-75160169.05}}"/emote farmer 16/faceDirection Shiro 2/emote Shiro 40/pause 500/speak Shiro "{{i18n:event-75160169.06}}"/emote farmer 40/faceDirection farmer 2/speak Shiro "{{i18n:event-75160169.07}}"/emote Shiro 40/speak Shiro "{{i18n:event-75160169.08}}"/emote farmer 32/pause 4000/speak Shiro "{{i18n:event-75160169.09}}"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/message "{{i18n:event-75160169.10}}"/end dialogue Shiro "{{i18n:event-75160169.11}}"
Entries.75160238/e 75160237/w sunny/z winter/t 2: ocean/20 11/farmer 20 9 2 Shiro 21 9 2/skippable/fade/addTemporaryActor RSVtent 48 80 19 4 2 false/addTemporaryActor RSVcampfire 16 32 20 11 2 false/pause 500/move Shiro 0 2 3/pause 1000/showFrame Shiro 16/pause 2000/playSound stoneCrack/pause 2000/playSound stoneCrack/showFrame RSVcampfire 1/addLantern 31 20 11 4/emote Shiro 32/emote farmer 56/speak Shiro "Still got it.$h"/move Shiro 0 -2 3/faceDirection farmer 1/emote farmer 8/emote Shiro 32/speak Shiro "Yep, I'm okay.$h#$b#I'm happy I still remember some survival training stuff from the army.$h"/emote farmer 32/faceDirection farmer 2/faceDirection Shiro 2/pause 3000/speak Shiro "I miss this atmosphere.$h#$b#You know? When I was younger, after a long day of surfing, I used to spend some nights at the beach like this.#$b#The only difference was I was alone.#$b#But, I didn't mind, as it felt like the sound of the crashing waves and the crackling fire kept me company.#$b#With my board at the side, and some fish being cooked in a stick.$h#$b#Man, such wonderful memories.$h"/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection Shiro 3/emote farmer 28/speak Shiro "Hey! I didn't mean for it to sound sad!$h#$b#I just wanted to relate that old feeling to what I have here tonight."/emote farmer 8/speak Shiro "Things may be different now in my case, but at this certain point in time, I feel the same peace as before like nothing's changed.#$b#Now that I'm here with you.$l#$b#I just feel, well, happy.$h#$b#I was happy before, got beaten up, but found happiness and acceptance in the end.#$b#Thanks to you and everyone.$h"/emote farmer 60/emote Shiro 56/speak Shiro "Hey, come on.#$b#Let's take a walk at the shores, shall we?$h"/emote farmer 32/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp farmer 70 24/faceDirection farmer 1/warp Shiro 70 25/faceDirection Shiro 1/fade/viewport 75 24/pause 500/advancedMove farmer false 5 0/move Shiro 4 0 2/emote farmer 8/faceDirection farmer 2/speak Shiro "Look, hun.$h"/emote farmer 8/move Shiro 0 -1 1/speak Shiro "Keep your eyes at the horizon.#$b#Yeah, just right where the moon and the ocean meet.$h"/emote farmer 40/faceDirection Shiro 2/emote Shiro 56/speak Shiro "Well... I just realized how amazing everything is.#$b#Something that seems so small, like almost touching, but in reality are millions of miles apart.$h#$b#It's just the way how we see it from our perspective."/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Shiro 1/emote Shiro 60/speak Shiro "I was like that before, always thinking that my perspective is the only right thing.$s#$b#Didn't broaden my horizons, and thought things will end the moment I couldn't be who I was before.$s#$b#But no, I became someone stronger.$h#$b#I was able to open my eyes.$h#$b#You motivated me, you inspired me, and you encouraged me.$l#$b#Well, everyone did.$l#$b#But I'm glad you're one of them.$h"/playMusic cm:ShiroTheme/emote farmer 20/positionOffset Shiro 1 0/positionOffset farmer -1 0/pause 100/positionOffset Shiro 1 -15/positionOffset farmer -1 0/pause 100/showFrame Shiro 28/animate farmer true true 100 101/positionOffset Shiro 1 0/positionOffset farmer -1 0/pause 100/positionOffset Shiro 1 0/positionOffset farmer -1 0/pause 100/specificTemporarySprite heart 75 22/pause 5000/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Shiro 1/positionOffset Shiro -4 0/positionOffset farmer 4 0/emote Shiro 20/speak Shiro "Never stop being amazing, @.$l#$b#And I'll be trying my best to be too."/emote farmer 32/emote Shiro 60/speak Shiro "What? I'm amazing too?$l#$b#Psh! Oh you!$h"/emote farmer 32 true/emote Shiro 32/speak Shiro "How about this, let's both just live and maybe become better than who we were yesterday.#$b#Let's just, live, Okay?$l"/emote farmer 20/positionOffset Shiro 1 0/positionOffset farmer -1 0/pause 100/positionOffset Shiro 1 0/positionOffset farmer -1 0/pause 100/showFrame Shiro 28/animate farmer true true 100 101/positionOffset Shiro 1 0/positionOffset farmer -1 0/pause 100/positionOffset Shiro 1 0/positionOffset farmer -1 0/pause 3000/end newDay

Entries.75160236/e 75160235/w sunny/t 1700 2000: cm:PhilipTheme/14 21/farmer 11 23 1 Philip 14 21 2 Paula -100 -100 1/skippable/animate Philip false true 300 16 17 18/pause 500/move farmer 3 0 0/emote farmer 32/emote Philip 56/stopAnimation Philip 2/speak Philip "Oh! Sorry, hon!$h#$b#I was just reading the reference comic issue of the movie we're about to watch.#$b#I want to see what they kept and what they changed!$h"/emote farmer 28/jump Philip/emote Philip 32/speak Philip "Let's go!$h#$b#Woohoo!$h"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeLocation Custom_Ridgeside_RSVCliff/warp farmer 21 22/warp Philip 21 20/faceDirection Philip 0/fade/viewport 23 19/pause 500/move Philip 0 -3 2/speak Philip "You good, hon?#$b#Let's go!$h"/emote farmer 32/move farmer 0 -2 0/playSound ow/emote farmer 16/message "You missed a step and sprained your ankle!"/faceDirection farmer 2/showFrame 5/emote Philip 16/speed Philip 4/move Philip -1 0 2/speed Philip 4/move Philip 0 3 1/speak Philip "Hon? Are you okay?$s#$b#Here, may I hold it?$s"/emote farmer 28/move Philip 0 1 1/move Philip 1 0 0/emote Philip 28/speak Philip "It looks like an inversion sprain, hon.$s#$b#It's all gonna be okay. I'll wrap it against a splint and carry you to the clinic, okay?"/emote farmer 28/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeLocation Custom_Ridgeside_PaulaClinic/warp farmer 19 5/faceDirection farmer 2/warp Paula 18 4/warp Philip 17 5/faceDirection Philip 1/fade/viewport 17 6/pause 1000/emote Paula 32/speak Paula "You have nothing to worry about, @.$h#$b#It's nothing really serious. Honestly, you could walk fine after a few hours of rest."/emote farmer 32/emote Philip 32/speak Philip "Phew! Thanks Doc!$h"/faceDirection Paula 2/emote Paula 28/speak Paula "And you, Philip.#$b#Knowing you, I know you would've known this as well.#$b#Maybe this time because it's your spouse so you overreacted a bit?$h"/emote Philip 28/speak Philip "Uh. Heh!$l#$b#Yeah, I guess I did.$h#$b#My apologies, Doc. And thank you once again."/emote Paula 32/speak Paula "Ofcourse! But why were you both in a hurry anyway?$h#$b#@ slipped because you guys were in a hurry, or atleast that's what you told me.#$b#Any emergency somewhere?$s"/emote Philip 28/speak Philip "Nah, Doc.$h#$b#It's my fault, we were in a rush to Heaps to catch a livestream of an old flick.$s#$b#I rushed @ to catch up and look what happened.$s"/emote Paula 28/speak Paula "Oh my!$h#$b#Well, I'm just glad everything's fine.#$b#Just let @ rest for a bit, okay?$h"/emote Philip 32/emote farmer 32/speak Philip "Gotcha, Doc!$h"/speak Paula "Now, if you'll excuse me."/advancedMove Paula false 0 2 1 0 0 6 -2 0/pause 3000/move Philip 1 0 1/faceDirection farmer 3/emote Philip 28/speak Philip "I'm sorry for the rush, hon.$s#$b#You tripped because I was being too hasty.$s"/emote farmer 56/speak Philip "But I'm glad you're okay.$h"/emote farmer 16/emote farmer 8/emote Philip 32/speak Philip "The movie livestream?#$b#Nah, I'll stay here with you.$h#$b#You're much more important than any movie or comic book out there.$l#$b#So don't ever worry about us missing that flick.$h#$b#I'll always choose you.$l"/emote farmer 60/emote Philip 32/speak Philip "Hey...$l"/positionOffset Philip 1 0/positionOffset farmer -1 0/pause 100/positionOffset Philip 1 -15/positionOffset farmer -1 0/pause 100/showFrame Philip 28/animate farmer true true 100 101/positionOffset Philip 1 0/positionOffset farmer -1 0/pause 100/positionOffset Philip 1 0/positionOffset farmer -1 0/pause 100/specificTemporarySprite heart 19 2/pause 5000/faceDirection Philip 1/faceDirection farmer 3/speak Philip "You're my favorite superhero.$l#$b#And our movie is the best one there is.$l#$b#I wouldn't miss it for anything.$h"/emote farmer 60/emote Paula 56/advancedMove Paula false 2 0 0 -4/pause 3000/speak Paula "Hey, lovebirds!$h#$b#I told Kiarra about what happened, and she said that she recorded it for you guys and will come by after she's done.#$b#Philip! You do realize we can record stuff, right?$h"/faceDirection Philip 2/faceDirection farmer 2/emote Philip 16 true/emote farmer 28/speak Philip "Oh right!$u#$b#We could've just done that.$s#$b#Well, this is embarassing.$l"/faceDirection farmer 3/emote farmer 32/faceDirection Philip 28/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/message "After a while, Kiarra arrived and gave us the copy.#Philip and I watched the movie back home."/end dialogue Philip "That was awesome!$h"

There were so much rushed orders!$h#$b#Welcome, @!"/speak Irene "We hope you enjoy your night!$h#$b#We were surprised when Flor asked us to help her with preparations for something.#$b#What's the special occasion?$h"/emote farmer 28/emote Ysabelle 32/speak Ysabelle "Over here, @!$h#$b#Hurry! Your wife's waiting for you upstairs!$h"/move farmer 3 0 0/faceDirection Kiarra 1/faceDirection Richard 1/move farmer 0 -3 0/faceDirection Irene 1/jump Corine/emote Corine 28/move Corine 0 1 2/move Corine -1 0 2/speak Corine "Here's the printed manual for your activities tonight!$h#$b#Kiarra did the design, I just had to work with the printer.$h#$b#Seriously! Your wife was so sudden with all these plans!#$b#What's happening, @?$h"/message "A paper full of activities is given to you.#This looks overloaded!"/emote farmer 28/viewport move 1 0 5000/speed Trinnie 5/advancedMove Trinnie false 0 9 -6 0/speed Keahi 5/advancedMove Keahi false 0 8 -4 0 0 1 -4 0/pause 5000/faceDirection Keahi 0/viewport 15 8/speak Trinnie "@! We're helping out Mrs. Flor!$h"/speak Keahi "Everything's ready upstairs!$h"/faceDirection farmer 2/emote farmer 16/jump Keahi/speak Trinnie "Let's go, @!$h#$b#Mrs. Flor is waiting for you!$h"/emote farmer 32/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp Richard -100 -100 true/warp Kiarra -100 -100 true/warp Irene -100 -100 true/warp Ysabelle -100 -100 true/warp Corine -100 -100 true/changeLocation Custom_Ridgeside_LogCabinHotel3rdFloor/warp Trinnie 11 14 true/warp Keahi 13 13 true/warp Pika 13 8 true/warp Faye 11 8/warp farmer 12 15/stopAdvancedMoves/fade/viewport 12 8/advancedMove Keahi false 0 -3/advancedMove Trinnie false 0 -4/move farmer 0 -5 0/emote farmer 8/faceDirection Pika 2/faceDirection Faye 2/emote Faye 56/speak Faye "Ah! Fabulous!$h#$b#She's been waiting!$h#$b#She asked me to lend her a cute dress.#$b#I'm excited for you to see her!$h"/emote Pika 32/speak Pika "Your wahine's a thoughtful one, @.$h#$b#I'll bring over your food soon.#$b#They were kind of rushed since Flor suddenly asked us for a favor!$h"/emote farmer 28/emote Faye 56/speak Faye "Well?#$b#Don't keep your lovely crimson flower waiting.$h"/emote farmer 32/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp Pika -100 -100 true/warp Faye -100 -100 true/warp Keahi -100 -100 true/warp Trinnie -100 -100/stopMusic/changeLocation Custom_Ridgeside_RidgesideVillage/warp farmer 117 13/changePortrait Flor Dress/changeSprite Flor Dress/addProp 8 110 12/addProp 9 111 12/addProp 10 112 12/addProp 40 110 13/addProp 41 111 13/addProp 42 112 13/addLantern 93 111 12 3/warp Flor 113 13/pause 1000/message "I wonder what my wife is up to?"/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 3000/playMusic cm:FlorTheme/fade/viewport 113 13/pause 2000/emote Flor 40/speak Flor "Everything seems in order...#$b#Wait... No. It feels like some stuff are lacking.$s"/move farmer -2 0 3/emote Flor 16/faceDirection Flor 1/speak Flor "@!$s#$b#I feel like I'm missing something!$s#$b#I don't think what I've prepared is enough!$s"/move Flor 1 0 1/speak Flor "See, look at this book!$a#$b#I'm missing photographers, fireworks, more lights, rose petals-$a"/emote farmer 28/emote Flor 8/speak Flor "You don't mind?$s#$b#But-but!$s#$b#I assumed the perfect date is only possible if I follow this book word-by-word.$s#$b#I'm confused!$s#$b#Won't this failure make the unideal wife?$s"/emote farmer 28/animate farmer true true 100 101/positionOffset farmer -4 10/emote Flor 16/message "You hug flor."/speak Flor "@?$l#$b#Wha-what's wrong?$12"/faceDirection farmer 3/positionOffset farmer 4 0/emote farmer 20/emote Flor 60/speak Flor "You mean, I didn't have to do any of this?$12#$b#I just wanted to make you happy.$12"/emote farmer 56/emote Flor 60/speak Flor "I'm sorry if I was too much...$12#$b#I must've gave everyone a hard time with rushed favors.$12#$b#I don't even know if this dress is appealing for you...$12"/emote farmer 56/emote Flor 60/speak Flor "@...$12#$b#I--$12#$b#I'm happy...$l#$b#I'm happy I married you...$l#$b#I hope you are too...$l"/emote farmer 20/positionOffset Flor 1 0/positionOffset farmer -1 0/pause 100/positionOffset Flor 1 0/positionOffset farmer -1 0/pause 100/showFrame Flor 28/animate farmer true true 100 101/positionOffset Flor 1 0/positionOffset farmer -1 0/pause 100/positionOffset Flor 1 0/positionOffset farmer -1 0/pause 100/specificTemporarySprite heart 115 12/pause 5000/emote Flor 20/pause 5000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 3000/message "We had a wonderful night afterwards..."/end dialogue Flor "I thanked everyone who made our date successful!$h"
Entries.75160240/e 75160239: SettlingIn/11 10/farmer 8 10 1 Ysabelle 9 9 1 Richard 11 10 3/skippable/pause 500/emote Richard 56/speak Richard "Glad to see you both!$h#$b#Now, it's just the prelimnary design, and it's subject to change.#$b#But I'd like to know what you both think before proceeding with the plans.#$b#Especially your critique, Ysa dear.$h"/emote Ysabelle 20/speak Ysabelle "Oh, grandpa!$h#$b#You know me so well! I'm just so happy to set foot at a ball room after all these years!$h"/emote farmer 32/emote Richard 56/speak Richard "Marvelous!$h#$b#Well, follow me."/move Richard 2 0 1/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeLocation Custom_Ridgeside_LogCabinEventHall_Ballroom/warp farmer 14 27/faceDirection farmer 0/warp Ysabelle 15 27/faceDirection Ysabelle 0/warp Richard 15 25/faceDirection Richard 0/fade/viewport 15 20/move farmer 0 -5 0 true/move Ysabelle 0 -5 0 true/move Richard 0 -5 0 2 true/pause 3000/faceDirection Richard 2/emote Ysabelle 16/emote Richard 32/speak Ysabelle "Grandpa!$13#$b#This place looks beautiful!$h"/emote farmer 32/speak Richard "Ah, I'm glad to hear that!$h#$b#It's still a little rough around the edges, but it looks promising."/faceDirection Ysabelle 1/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/faceDirection Ysabelle 3/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 1000/faceDirection Ysabelle 0/pause 1000/emote Richard 56/emote Ysabelle 8/speak Ysabelle "Grandpa?#$b#What's with that grin?$13#$b#Hmm... Is there another reason why you wanted us to come here?$13"/emote Richard 56/speak Richard "Why, of course!$h#$b#I didn't doubt you'd notice.$h#$b#So, head over to the your old room at the second floor, Ysa dear.#$b#I left a surprise for you.$h"/jump Ysabelle/emote Ysabelle 16/speak Ysabelle "Grandpa! You're serious?$h"/faceDirection Ysabelle 3/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Ysabelle "Come on, love!$h#$b#Let's check it out!$h"/emote Richard 32/speak Richard "Actually, dear.#$b#I want to talk to @ for a while.#$b#So go get your surprise alone, okay?$h"/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Ysabelle 0/emote farmer 8 true/emote Ysabelle 8/speak Ysabelle "What are you planning, old man?$13#$b#Oh well, I can't help it then.$h"/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection Ysabelle 3/speak Ysabelle "I'll be right back, love.$l"/emote farmer 32/faceDirection farmer 2/textAboveHead Ysabelle "I can't wait!"/speed Ysabelle 3/move Ysabelle 0 9 2/warp Ysabelle -100 -100/emote farmer 28/faceDirection farmer 0/emote Richard 56/speak Richard "Ah, she's off.$h#$b#So @, I've prepared all this to actually give you both a chance to have a slow dance alone in a ball room.#$b#My granddaughter has always dreamed of such a fantasy, especially with someone she holds dear in her heart.#$b#Help me make her happy, won't you?$h"/emote farmer 32/emote Richard 56/speak Richard "Splendid!$h#$b#Now, I gave her a special dress to wear.#$b#I'm sorry I was not able to prepare one for you.$s"/emote farmer 56/speak Richard "I'll play a song in the speakers.#$b#You'll get the idea.$h"/emote farmer 28/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp farmer 15 14/faceDirection farmer 2/warp Richard 9 13/faceDirection Richard 2/changePortrait Ysabelle Ball/changeSprite Ysabelle Ball/warp Ysabelle 15 20/faceDirection Ysabelle 0/stopMusic/fade/viewport 14 16/move Ysabelle 0 -4 0/emote Ysabelle 60/emote farmer 60/emote Richard 32/speak Ysabelle "Love?$l#$b#Well? How do I look?$l"/emote farmer 20/emote Ysabelle 20/faceDirection Ysabelle 3/speak Ysabelle "Grandpa, you sly old man.$13#$b#You still remember that silly fantasy I told you before!$13"/emote Richard 56/speak Richard "Why, I don't know what you're talking about, dear.$h#$b#But I'll just play some music here, okay?#$b#Then I'll have to leave you both alone. I got some errands to do.$4"/faceDirection farmer 3/emote Ysabelle 28 true/emote farmer 28/speak Ysabelle "*Sigh* Whatever you say, grandpa.$13"/advancedMove Richard false 0 9 5 0 0 9/playMusic cm:YsaDance/pause 3000/faceDirection farmer 2/faceDirection Ysabelle 0/emote Ysabelle 60/speak Ysabelle "Well, love?$l#$b#Are we just going to stand here?$l"/emote farmer 32/move Ysabelle -1 0 1/move farmer 0 2 3/emote farmer 32/emote Ysabelle 60/speak Ysabelle "Looksie!$h"/faceDirection Ysabelle 2/pause 500/faceDirection Ysabelle 3/pause 500/faceDirection Ysabelle 0/pause 500/faceDirection Ysabelle 1/pause 500/emote Ysabelle 32/speak Ysabelle "It's lovely, isn't?$h"/emote farmer 56/speak Ysabelle "This is actually my grandmother's.$13#$b#My mom used to wear this before, and it seems like they've passed it down to me this time.$13#$b#It's something I'll treasure.$l"/emote farmer 56/showFrame Ysabelle 16/speak Ysabelle "Hold me close?$l"/emote farmer 32/positionOffset Ysabelle 1 Entries.75160234/e 75160233: playful/17 7/farmer 18 11 0 Maddie 18 6 0/skippable/pause 500/move farmer 0 -3 0/emote farmer 32/faceDirection Maddie 2/emote Maddie 56/speak Maddie "Finally!$h#$b#Ugh! You're so slow, you know that?$9#$b#But no matter, you're here, that's all it matters.$h"/emote farmer 28/speak Maddie "Okay, so...#$b#About a month ago, I ordered a package full of princess outfits.$h#$b#What you're about to see is for your eyes only.$l#$b#So don't EVER tell another soul about it!$a#$b#Or else you'll be sleeping in the couch, got that?$9"/emote farmer 28/emote Maddie 56/speak Maddie "Great!$h#$b#I can't wait to wear these!$h#$b#I really want to show them to you.$l#$b#So tell me what you think, okay?$h"/emote farmer 32/advancedMove Maddie false 1 0 0 -2 -1 0/pause 5000/emote farmer 40/speak Maddie "This might take a while, so just sit down or something!$h"/emote farmer 28/move farmer -4 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/emote farmer 40/changePortrait Maddie Merida/changeSprite Maddie Merida/emote Maddie 56/speak Maddie "*Lowering her voice* Behold! The princess has arrived!$h"/emote farmer 8/faceDirection farmer 1/speed Maddie 4/advancedMove Maddie false 1 0 0 3 -1 0/jump Maddie/move farmer 1 0 1/emote Maddie 56/speak Maddie "I am Meridia!$h#$b#Behold my trusty bow and rebellious charm!$h#$b#Hiyah!$a"/stopAdvancedMoves/jump Maddie/move Maddie -1 0 3/emote farmer 16/emote Maddie 56/speak Maddie "Well?$h#$b#Doesn't this look 'brave'?$h"/emote farmer 32/speak Maddie "Check it out!"/faceDirection Maddie 2/pause 1000/faceDirection Maddie 1/pause 1000/faceDirection Maddie 0/pause 1000/faceDirection Maddie 3/pause 1000/emote farmer 32/speak Maddie "Awww.$6#$b#You better make sure that was the truth or I'll shoot you with an arrow!$h"/emote farmer 28/emote Maddie 56/speak Maddie "Alright!$h#$b#Next one!$h"/speed Maddie 4/advancedMove Maddie false 2 0 0 -3 -1 0/move farmer 2 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 2/emote farmer 40/pause 3000/changePortrait Maddie Ariel/changeSprite Maddie Ariel/emote Maddie 16/speak Maddie "Uhh...$s#$b#Darling?$l#$b#A little help?$s"/emote farmer 8/move farmer 2 0 0/emote farmer 16/speak Maddie "Don't just stand there!$a#$b#Help me out!$a"/move farmer 0 -2 3/emote farmer 28/speak Maddie "Alright, I think I can crawl.$a#$b#Just give me a bit of help."/move farmer 0 1 0/advancedMove Maddie false 1 0/speak Maddie "Huff!$a"/move farmer 0 1 0/advancedMove Maddie false 0 1/move farmer -1 0 1/advancedMove Maddie false 0 1/emote Maddie 28/faceDirection Maddie 3/speak Maddie "Thank you.$s#$b#Now...$h"/jump Maddie/emote Maddie 56/speak Maddie "*Sings off tune*$h#$b#OH!$3#$b#Uhmm-Ehr... I'm the mermaid princess, Erial!$l"/emote Maddie 40/faceDirection Maddie 2/emote Maddie 60/speak Maddie "Okay, Now I'm starting to get embarrassed.$s#$b#What am I doing in front of my spouse!?$u"/emote farmer 32/faceDirection Maddie 3/emote Maddie 60/speak Maddie "Remember, sweetie.$h#$b#No one should know about this!$a"/stopAdvancedMoves/move Maddie 0 -1 0/pause 1000/move Maddie 0 -1 3/pause 1000/move Maddie -1 0 2/speak Maddie "Made it!$h#$b#Phew!"/move farmer 1 0 0/emote farmer 8/speak Maddie "Nope! I'm all fine now.$h#$b#Just one last costume!$h#$b#This is my favorite one.$6#$b#No peeking!$a"/emote farmer 28/move farmer 0 2 2/emote farmer 40/changeSprite Maddie Elsa/changePortrait Maddie Elsa/move Maddie 1 0 2/emote Maddie 60/speak Maddie "@?$l"/emote farmer 8/faceDirection farmer 0/emote farmer 60/emote Maddie 60/speak Maddie "Well?$l#$b#Don't just stand there and stare!$l#$b#It's embarassing!$l#$b#All I've been doing is embarassing and it just started to sink in!$l"/emote farmer 56/speak Maddie "Oh you...$l"/stopMusic/move Maddie 0 2 2/showFrame Maddie 18/jump Maddie/emote Maddie 16/speed farmer 4/move farmer 0 -1 0/faceDirection farmer 3/showFrame farmer 34/warp Maddie 18 7/showFrame Maddie 19/positionOffset Maddie 35 -20/message "Maddie slipped on her own cape.#Luckily you managed to catch her."/playMusic cm:MaddieTheme/emote Maddie 60 true/emote farmer 28/speak Maddie "Uh-Uhm!$u#$b#That was just embarassing.$l"/emote farmer 56/speak Maddie "Hehe...$l#$b#You know... This princess obsessed side of me has always been dreaming of my own knight in shining armor for as long as I can remember.$l"/emote farmer 8/showFrame Maddie 16/positionOffset Maddie -35 20/faceDirection farmer 3/emote farmer 16/message "Maddie gave you a kiss."/emote Maddie 20/faceDirection Maddie 1/speak Maddie "And I'm just happy I found that wonderful knight.$l#$b#My own fairytale.$l#$b#I admit, I'm still embarassed for showing this side of me.$s#$b#But I wanted share my happiness with you.$l#$b#And hopefully, you'll still love me no matter how childish I can get.$l"/emote farmer 32/emote Maddie 60/speak Maddie "Thank you, @...$l#$b#I love you.$l"/positionOffset Maddie 1 0/positionOffset farmer -1 0/pause 200/positionOffset Maddie 1 0/positionOffset farmer -1 0/pause 200/showFrame Maddie 16/animate farmer true true 100 101/positionOffset Maddie 1 0/positionOffset farmer -1 0/pause 200/positionOffset Maddie 1 0/positionOffset farmer -1 0/pause 200/specificTemporarySprite heart 19 5/pause 5000/emote Maddie 60/speak Maddie "Eh...$l#$b#I love this...$l"/emote farmer 20/speak Maddie "Don't let go of this ice queen just yet...$l#$b#Just hug me tight.$l#$b#I want to stay like this for a while.$l"/emote farmer 56/pause 2000/end dialogue Maddie "That was... Uhm... Nice.$l"

Entries.75160255/H/t 2000 2600/w sunny/n RSV.Com: nightTime/18 12/farmer 18 18 0 Belinda 18 10 0 Daia -100 -100 2 Jio -100 -100 2 Kiwi 92 12 2 Bliss -100 -100 2/broadcastEvent/skippable/pause 50/move farmer 0 -5 0/pause 3000/speak Belinda "This may be the day, Rae..."/pause 3000/faceDirection Belinda 2/pause 2000/speak Belinda "I've finally met her heir.#$b#You don't resemble her much, do you?$4#$b#I am Belinda, the Seer for the Red Tailed Lady.#$b#I am the only one who can communicate with her and so I exist to act out her will.#$b#And that is to find the Spirit realm and cleanse the spiritual corruption in this mountain.#$b#Now, farmer...$h#$b#I'm glad you managed to complete the tasks.#$b#Honestly speaking, you were the only one who can see anything from that book.#$b#You're... special. In a way.$4"/emote farmer 8/move Belinda -1 0 2/move Belinda 0 3 1/pause 1000/showFrame Belinda 24/pause 1000/speak Belinda "Oh my!$h#$b#You have such an interesting aura.#$b#You may be what I need.$h#$b#Come, follow.#$b#We can't waste any more time.#$b#This spiritual corruption must be cleansed as once."/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 2/move Belinda 0 5 2/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp farmer 87 24/warp Belinda 90 25/pause 2000/fade/viewport 89 22/move Belinda 4 0 0/move farmer 4 0 1/textAboveHead Belinda "Buhayin muli."/pause 3000/playSound wand/screenFlash .8/pause 2000/message "Belinda seems to have been imbued with some kind of energy.#She seems to have been revitalized."/emote Belinda 56/faceDirection Belinda 3/pause 1000/speak Belinda "Dear, first of all, I would like to express my gratitude for collecting those artifacts.#$b#My children and I have been deciphering that ancient book for years ever since we had it on our possession."/move Belinda -2 0 0/move Belinda 0 -1 3/pause 1000/speak Belinda "You don't know how delighted I am, dear farmer.$h#$b#Ah... You and your grandmother are so much alike.$4#$b#You both have, and had, made me very...#$b#Happy.$7"/playMusic spirits_eve/emote farmer 8/move Belinda 0 -3 3/faceDirection farmer 0/move Belinda -3 0 2/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 2000/speak Belinda "Followers of the path of mist and red.$u#$b#Covetting the embrace of the Red Tailed Lady.$a#$b#I sense you're all here and brought what she asks from each of you.$a#$b#I know you won't fail me now.$7#$b#Come fourth!$7"/showFrame Belinda 19/showFrame Daia 19/showFrame Jio 23/showFrame Bliss 19/warp Daia 88 23 true/warp Jio 89 23 true/warp Bliss 90 23 true/playSound shadowpeep/pause 800/faceDirection Daia 0/faceDirection Jio 0/faceDirection Bliss 0/pause 500/speak Bliss "Here's the ancient relic from Princess Ville, my lady."/speak Belinda "Wonderful, my ever so reliable retainer."/speak Daia "Seer, here's the artifact from Umuwi.#$b#I should say, it was really tricky going in and out that place.$6#$b#A local sorcerer had the place covered in a barrier."/speak Belinda "Ah... That must be Esmeralda and Salvador's son.#$b#I have other plans for that meddlesome human."/speak Jio "And here's the relic from East Scarpe.#$b#General Helen has also given me the relic she acquired from Zuzu.#$b#Unfortunately she can't attend, my lady.#$b#She didn't disclose why, but it seems she had a personal mission to attend to."/speak Belinda "Ah, that lovely Helen.#$b#I wonder why.$7#$b#It's alright. All that it matters is I have everything I need to open the Spirit realm.$6"/emote Belinda 56/faceDirection Belinda 2/speak Belinda "Thank you, children.$7#$b#Now, step aside.#$b#I'll take it from here.$6"/showFrame Daia 19/showFrame Jio 23/showFrame Bliss 19/playSound shadowpeep/pause 800/warp Daia 86 21 true/warp Jio 92 21 true/warp Bliss 89 15 true/playSound shadowpeep/pause 800/faceDirection Daia 2/faceDirection Jio 2/faceDirection Bliss 2/move Belinda 0 1 2/pause 1000/showFrame Belinda 16/addTemporaryActor RSVTemp1 48 36 88 24 2 false/playSound pickUpItem/pause 2000/speak Belinda "It's time...$6#$b#It's finally time.$6"/animate Belinda false true 500 16 17/playSound wand/glow 255 0 0/pause 1000/playSound wand/glow 255 0 0/pause 1000/playSound wand/glow 255 0 0/animate RSVTemp1 false true 50 1 2 3 3 2 1 1/stopAnimation Belinda 25/pause 1000/emote farmer 16 true/emote Daia 40 true/emote Jio 40 true/emote Bliss 40/glow 255 255 0/speak Belinda "Yes... Yes! I can finally open it!$8#$b#I can prove Raeriyala wrong!$8"/speak Daia "Seer Belinda...$s"/speak Bliss "...$s"/speak Jio "..."/glow 255 0 0/playSound wand/pause 1000/glow 255 0 0/playSound wand/pause 1000/showFrame Belinda 16/playSound wand/screenFlash .8/warp RSVTemp1 -100 -100/stopMusic/pause 800/playSound wand/emote farmer 16 true/emote Belinda 16 true/emote Bliss 16 true/emote Daia 16 true/emote Jio 16/pause 3000/message "The magic circle disappeared!"/pause 3000/speak Belinda "Huh?$u#$b#Wha-what?$u#$b#Where is it?$u#$b#WHERE IS IT!?$a"/move Belinda 0 1 2/pause 500/faceDirection Belinda 1/pause 500/faceDirection Belinda 3/pause 500/faceDirection Belinda 0/speak Belinda "Something sealed it...$u#$b#Who did-$u"/glow 0 255 0/playSound healSound/message "Bel... That portal was unstable...#It would've consumed you and your companions' lives."/emote farmer 16 true/emote Belinda 16/speak Belinda "That voice.$u#$b#Rae!$u"/faceDirection Belinda 3/pause 500/speak Belinda "RAERIYALA!$a#$b#I WAS SO CLOSE!$a#$b#I--$a"/message "My love... You'd think I'd let you perish trying to open the portal back home?#Please... Listen to me..."/speak Belinda "NO!$a#$b#I'm doing this for your own good!$a#$b#I need to open it alone and cleanse everything alone!$a#$b#Only I can do this!$a"/glow 0 255 0/playSound healSound/message "No.#You're not thinking straight...#Unseal me and listen to me...#What we need is already here..."/speak Belinda "What do you mean?$u#$b#I already have everything here!$a#$b#And how are you even able to communicate?! I've sealed you tight!$a"/glow 0 255 0/playSound healSound/message "I don't...#Have much time to communicate...#Just unseal this bothersome seal of yours...#And I'll tell you what I wanted to tell you long ago...#But you wouldn't listen!"/speak Belinda "What if I don't?$a"/message "Then you won't be able to open that portal ever again...#I'll keep on sealing this knowing you'll bring your own end if I let you be...#Unseal me...#I found a better way for the both of us...#Bring the farmer along..."/glow 0 255 0/playSound healSound/speak Belinda "Rae?$a#$b#Raeriyala answer me!$a"/pause 5000/emote Belinda 40/faceDirection Belinda 0/speak Jio "It seems the voice has disappeared, my lady."/speak Daia "I wonder who was that?#$b#You know that voice, Lady Seer?$6"/speak Bliss "My lady, who was that?$s"/speak Belinda "Someone foolish, selfish, and bothersome!$a#$b#Someone...$a#$b#Someone...$s"/faceDirection Belinda 2/pause 1000/speak Belinda "My beloved...$4#$b#My foolish beloved."/emote farmer 40/speak Daia "Well...$s#$b#What now?$s"/speak Bliss "My lady, what is our next move?"/emote Belinda 40/pause 2000/faceDirection Belinda 0/pause 1000/speak Belinda "*sigh*$s#$b#We'll prepare to unseal my beloved.#$b#Then I'll explain everything to you, my children."/faceDirection Belinda 2/pause 800/speak Belinda "Farmer dear, You heard that voice too didn't you?#$b#It seems my beloved owes us both a revelation.#$b#It's best you help us with the preparations to unseal her.#$b#I know you have a lot of questions in your mind at the moment.#$b#But I'll let my beloved handle all those.#$b#She was the one closest to your grandmother before, anyway.$h"/emote farmer 8/speak Belinda "You'll know soon enough.#$b#For now, just assist us.#$b#Alright?$h"/emote farmer 28/speak Belinda "Splendid!$h#$b#Meet my children here at this shack tomorrow.#$b#I'll leave the preparations to all of you.#$b#I'd have to go somewhere to prepare something as well.$h"/faceDirection Belinda 0/pause 800/speak Belinda "Bliss, darling. Let's go."/faceDirection Belinda 2/showFrame Bliss 19/playSound shadowpeep/pause 800/warp Bliss 88 22/pause 500/faceDirection Bliss 2/speak Bliss "Yes, my lady."/speak Belinda "Jio. Daia.#$b#Await for further instructions."/speak Daia "Yes, my Seer."/speak Jio "Yes, my lady."/speak Belinda "And farmer dear.#$b#See you soon.$h"/showFrame Belinda 16/pause 500/warp Belinda -100 -100 true/warp Bliss -100 -100/screenFlash .8/playSound wand/emote farmer 16/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Daia "See you tomorrow, cutie!$6"/showFrame Daia 19/playSound shadowpeep/pause 800/warp Daia -100 -100/speak Jio "You should get some rest, @."/showFrame Jio 23/playSound shadowpeep/pause 800/warp Jio -100 -100/emote farmer 40/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/message "My grandmother?#Spirit realm?#And who was that voice?"/pause 3000/end

Where are you?"/speak Belinda "Raeriyala!$4#$b#You foolish spirit, I'm coming!$h"/showFrame Belinda 16/pause 500/playSound wand/screenFlash .8/warp Belinda -100 -100/emote farmer 16/speak Bliss "I've farmer 3/speak Bliss "My lady seems happy.#$b#Thank you, farmer.$h#$b#Let's catch up to her."/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/stopMusic/playMusic cm:AweAmbience/changeToTemporaryMap Custom_Ridgeside_RidgeFalls/warp farmer 39 27 true/warp Bluss 38 22 true/warp Belinda 39 20 true/warp Raeriyala 39 17 true/faceDirection farmer 0 true/faceDirection Bliss 0 true/faceDirection Raeriyala 2 true/faceDirection Belinda 2/fade/viewport 39 19/pause 500/move farmer 0 -3 0/emote Raeriyala 32/speak Raeriyala "Why, isn't it @, the farmer.#$b#I'm happy I finally got to meet you.$h"/faceDirection Belinda 2/pause 800/speak Belinda "I've finished all what this spirit and I needed to discuss about.#$b#So you may proceed to talk to her.$4#$b#She'll explain everything, and should be as she's the one who has dragged everything to what things are now.$h"/move Belinda 0 2 2/faceDirection Bliss 1/move Belinda 1 0 3/speak Raeriyala "Come closer, Oh farmer.#$b#Don't be shy.$h"/move farmer 0 -3 0/speak Raeriyala "A little more.$h"/emote farmer 28/move farmer 0 -1 0/emote Raeriyala 56/speak Raeriyala "Oh my, you remind me of her...$4#$b#Ah, I'm so happy to meet you.$h"/emote farmer 8/speak Raeriyala "My name is Raeriyala, the mountain spirit of the valley.#$b#I've been keeping this land fertile and healthy for centuries.#$b#Isn't it a little weird how crops and forage grow so fast around the valley?$h#$b#Oh my, that might be because of me.$h"/emote farmer 32/speak Belinda "Don't be so full of yourself now, Rae.$h"/emote Raeriyala 28/speak Raeriyala "Oh hush, my love.$4#$b#I merely jest.#$b#Or am I?$h"/faceDirection Belinda 0/pause 500/emote Belinda 12/speak Belinda "Why don't we skip to the part about that revelation you owe us from the last time you foiled my plan?$a#$b#I've done everything on my end and freed you from my seal, so let's get to it."/speak Raeriyala "Love, you know I did all those things before for you.$s#$b#Preventing you from opening the portal and entering the Spirit realm alone is for your own good.$a#$b#You do know what happens if we spirits get exposed to Gabriella's corruption.$s"/emote Belinda 40/speak Belinda "Fine.$a#$b#Then let's carry on with your plan.$7"/speak Raeriyala "Thank you, for finally listening to me, my love.$4"/faceDirection Belinda 1/emote Belinda 40 true/emote Raeriyala 32/speak Raeriyala "I'm sorry for that, @.#$b#Let's see here..."/pause 800/showFrame Raeriyala 16/playSound wand/screenFlash .8/globalfade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp farmer 15 44 true/warp Bliss 14 45 true/warp Belinda 16 45 true/warp Raeriyala 15 42/fade/viewport 15 44/emote farmer 16/showFrame Raeriyala 0/speak Raeriyala "Oh!$h#$b#Here's something I've set up just for you, @.$h"/emote Belinda 8/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection Belinda 3/faceDirection Bliss 2/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/faceDirection Bliss 3/faceDirection Belinda 0/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Bliss 0/speak Belinda "Rae, isn't this what we used before with-$a"/speak Raeriyala "Yes, with @'s grandmother.$s#$b#A long time ago from our first attempt.$s"/emote Belinda 12/speak Belinda "What foolishness are you up to, Raeriyala?$a"/speak Raeriyala "Belinda, hear me out.$a"/faceDirection Raeriyala 1/pause 500/faceDirection Raeriyala 3/pause 500/faceDirection Raeriyala 2/pause 1000/speak Raeriyala "Oh, @. Your grandparents were something special.$4#$b#In this case, we'll talk about your grandmother.$s"/emote farmer 8/speak Raeriyala "She was just a young girl when Belinda and I first met her.#$b#She intrigued us.#$b#Long story short, we became close, and oh, she was such a kind soul.$4"/emote Belinda 40/speak Raeriyala "For years, everything was fine.$4#$b#Your grandparents met, had kids, and lived a happy life.#$b#Until the day the corruption around these mountains started to appear.$a#$b#It was the arrival of some human-$a#$b#No... She wasn't human.$a#$b#An evil entity named Gabriella.$a#$b#Along with her followers... They started to spread corruption into some parts of the mountains and wrecked havoc as much as they can.$a#$b#It was all manageable until they found some way to enter the Spirit realm and bring their corruption there.$a#$b#Which made things worse here in the human realm.$s"/faceDirection Raeriyala 0/emote Raeriyala 40/speak Raeriyala "Belinda and I can't enter that corrupted realm without any serious reprecussions towards everything that are linked to us.$s#$b#Me being the spirit of the mountain might bring more harm than good if I leave this place, let alone get corrupted.$s#$b#While Belinda, oh... Well...$s"/move Belinda 0 -2 3/speak Belinda "I was once a corrupted spirit, and Raeriyala saved me.$s#$b#And being exposed to that corruption might turn me back...$s"/faceDirection Raeriyala 2/pause 1000/speak Raeriyala "Your grandmother, she who has a connection to the spirits like your grandfather,#$b#Is able to enter the corrupted realm without getting lost.#$b#She volunteered to enter herself.#$b#To get rid of the corruption from the inside to save this world.$s#$b#I wish I could tell a happy story, but it's not.$s#$b#Something happened in the spirit realm.$s#$b#The corruption got weak and became manageable again.$s#$b#And so we were able to contain the corruption to just the ridge forest.$s#$b#But, your grandmother came back unconscious and afflicted by some curse.$s#$b#And...$s"/faceDirection Belinda 3/speak Belinda "Your grandmother left this world a few seasons later.$s#$b#It was because of some unknown disease, the human doctors said, according to your grandfather.$s#$b#But no... We know it's because she saved this valley.$s"/speak Raeriyala "And that's the story, @.$s"/emote Bliss 40/emote farmer 40/speak Belinda "Now, our goal is to finish what your grandmother, and our dear friend, has started and sacrificed her life to do.$a#$b#To get rid of the corrupted spiritual energy from parts of this mountain.$a"/speak Raeriyala "Belinda has been pushing for a forceful entry into the realm along with her followers.$s#$b#But I won't allow it because it is too destructive.$a#$b#All these years, I've been waiting for you, @.#$b#Only you can continue your grandmother's will.#$b#Just like how you are fulfilling your grandfather's will with your farm, please fulfill hers as well.$s"/emote farmer 40/pause 500/emote farmer 32/speak Raeriyala "Thank you, @.$4"/speak Belinda "Now, Rae. What's your plan?"/speak Raeriyala "Just like before, we need to find the appropriate relics to siphon magical energy and power up a proper portal.#$b#With these pedestals as mediums, everything would be stable.#$b#Though, all we need are the relics.$s#$b#Those relics you used before were too weak.$s#$b#We need to find stronger ones.#$b#Ones that hold a stronger connection to Ridgeside.$4"/speak Belinda "And I took care of that.$h#$b#Bliss, darling?"/faceDirection Bliss 1/pause 800/speak Bliss "Yes, my lady.#$b#Daia has confirmed that they have found more pages of the ancient book and has added them to the binder.#$b#It should be accessible for the farmer when they visit the local base, the old cottage east from here."/emote Raeriyala 16 true/emote Belinda 20/speak Belinda "Splendid!$h"/speak Raeriyala "You have such dependable followers, my love.$4#$b#This one looks adorable as well!$h"/faceDirection Bliss 0/speak Bliss "Your words honor me, great mountain spirit.#$b#Thank you.$h"/speak Belinda "Dear farmer, please do take a look into the book once again soon.#$b#The new pages should contain hints on how to obtain stronger artifacts."/faceDirection farmer 1/emote farmer 32/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Raeriyala "Once you collect all of them, place them on top of these pedestals.$h#$b#Though to be honest, I myself don't know which should go where.$4#$b#But the pedestal should light up once the correct relic is placed on top of it.$h#$b#Oh, with that, it shouldn't be difficult.$h"/emote farmer 56/speak Raeriyala "We'll be waiting for you, @.$h"/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Belinda "Bliss, darling.#$b#Escort our dear farmer out, will you?$h#$b#Raeriyala and I have much more to discuss."/speak Bliss "Yes, my lady."/move Bliss 0 -1 1/speak Bliss "Hold your breath, farmer."/faceDirection farmer 3/emote farmer 16/warp farmer -100 -100/warp Helen 15 44/showFrame Bliss 19/playSound shadowpeep/pause 800/warp Bliss -100 -100/warp Helen -100 -100/pause 500/move Belinda 0 -1 3/faceDirection Raeriyala 1/pause 800/speak Raeriyala "Bel...$4"/speak Belinda "Rae...$4"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/playSound questcomplete/message "Unlocked new pages in Ninja House book!#Unlocked Pedestals in the Ridge Falls!#Unlocked Moutain Spirit Offering Feature!#You can visit the Ridge falls and offer items to Raeriyala for blessings."/end
Entries.75160232/e 75160231/w sunny/t 2000 2400: nightTime/12 14/farmer 8 17 1 Kenneth 16 12 0/skippable/changeLocation Custom_Ridgeside_Ridge_KennethDate_OFF/animate Kenneth false true 300 24 25 26 25 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8/playSound crafting/pause 1000/playSound crafting/emote farmer 8/move farmer 5 0 0/emote Kenneth 56/speak Kenneth "Got to hurry!$s"/stopAnimation Kenneth 8/speed Kenneth 4/move Kenneth -7 0 0/animate Kenneth false true 300 24 25 26 25 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8 8/playSound crafting/pause 1000/playSound crafting/emote farmer 40/speak Kenneth "And, that should do it!$h"/stopAnimation Kenneth 8/emote Kenneth 32/speak Kenneth "I wonder where's @?$6"/emote farmer 40/emote Kenneth 8/faceDirection Kenneth 2/pause 1000/speak Kenneth "Oh, hey hun."/emote farmer 40/pause 3000/showFrame Kenneth 27/jump Kenneth/emote Kenneth 16/speak Kenneth "OH! @!$u#$b#You're here!$u"/emote farmer 28/faceDirection Kenneth 2/emote Kenneth 28/speak Kenneth "I-ehr.$l#$b#Well, that was embarrassing.$l"/move Kenneth 3 0 2/move Kenneth 0 2 1/move farmer 0 -3 3/emote farmer 8/emote Kenneth 56/speak Kenneth "I'm glad you're finally here though.$h#$b#I'm sorry it seemed like I was such a klutz!$h"/emote farmer 28/speak Kenneth "Well, since you're here.#$b#I want to show you a little something.$h"/emote farmer 8/emote Kenneth 56/speak Kenneth "Here-uhh.$6#$b#Uhm... Where did I put it...$6"/faceDirection Kenneth 3/emote farmer 8/emote Kenneth 56/speak Kenneth "Ah! Here's the remote!$h"/showFrame Kenneth 23/pause 1000/playSound skeletonStep/pause 1000/playSound skeletonStep/emote farmer 8/faceDirection Kenneth 1/emote Kenneth 28/speak Kenneth "Close your eyes.$h"/globalfade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeLocation Custom_Ridgeside_Ridge_KennethDate_ON/playSound skeletonStep/pause 3000/speak Kenneth "Okay, open.$h"/playMusic cm:KennethTheme/fade/viewport 14 14/glow 255 255 255/emote farmer 16/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 1500/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 1500/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1500/emote Kenneth 56/faceDirection farmer 3/emote farmer 60/speak Kenneth "I just wanted to show you a glimpse of how much you light up and give color to my life.$l#$b#Hey, that sounded so cheesy, didn't it?$h#$b#But yeah, I realized I don't really show my affection much.#$b#But I just want you to know, that I am just happy that you're with me, and I'm with you.$l#$b#I love you, @.$l"/emote farmer 20/positionOffset Kenneth 1 0/positionOffset farmer -1 0/pause 200/positionOffset Kenneth 1 0/positionOffset farmer -1 0/pause 200/showFrame Kenneth 28/animate farmer true true 100 101/positionOffset Kenneth 1 -10/positionOffset farmer -1 0/pause 200/positionOffset Kenneth 1 0/positionOffset farmer -1 0/pause 200/specificTemporarySprite heart 13 12/pause 5000/playSound skeletonStep/pause 1000/playSound skeletonStep/viewport -1000 -1000/changeLocation Custom_Ridgeside_Ridge_KennethDate_OFF/fade/viewport 14 14/emote farmer 8 true/emote Kenneth 8/faceDirection Kenneth 2/faceDirection farmer 2/emote Kenneth 28/emote farmer 32/speak Kenneth "Well... Uhh-$u#$b#I guess this is how my world looks like when you're not in it?$l#$b#Yes! Ehr-This was part of the plan!$u#$b#This is embarassing.$l"/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Kenneth 1/emote farmer 20/emote Kenneth 60/speak Kenneth "Well, I'm just happy I got to see you smile.$h#$b#Why don't we stay here for a while and do some star gazing, hun?$h"/emote farmer 56/pause 1000/end dialogue Kenneth "Phew! I'm sorry we to clean everything up afterwards.$h"

Entries.75160187: continue/84 128/farmer 84 132 0 Jio 84 126 0/skippable/addTemporaryActor Beast2 16 32 90 126 2 false/pause 500/move farmer 0 -3 0/emote farmer 8/emote Jio 40/faceDirection Jio 2/pause 1000/speak Jio "{{i18n:event-75160187.01}}"/emote farmer 8/speak Jio "{{i18n:event-75160187.02}}"/speed Beast2 3/move Beast2 -5 0 3/animate Jio false false 200 24 25 26/playSound swordswipe/showFrame Beast2 19/emote farmer 16/faceDirection Jio 1/speak Jio "{{i18n:event-75160187.03}}"/pause 1000/faceDirection Jio 2/speak Jio "{{i18n:event-75160187.04}}"/emote farmer 28/speak Jio "{{i18n:event-75160187.05}}"/showFrame Jio 23/playSound shadowpeep/pause 800/warp Jio -1000 -1000/emote farmer 16/pause 1000/end
Entries.75160257/H/t 600 1900/e 75160255: continue/84 128/farmer 84 132 0 Belinda 84 126 0 Jio 82 128 0 Bliss 85 127 0 Daia 86 128 3/broadcastEvent/skippable/pause 500/move farmer 0 -2 0/faceDirection Jio 2/pause 800/speak Jio "Greetings, @."/faceDirection Jio 1/pause 800/speak Jio "My lady, the farmer has arrived."/pause 1000/emote Belinda 56/faceDirection Bliss 2/faceDirection Belinda 2/pause 800/emote Belinda 32/speak Belinda "You're finally here, farmer."/faceDirection Daia 2/pause 500/speak Daia "Why, hello there.$6"/move Belinda 0 2 2/speak Belinda "Jio. Daia.#$b#See to your tasks now.#$b#All I need is the farmer for the unsealing.#$b#Get rid of anything that may interfere.#$b#Especially of movements from Gabriella's minions.$a"/faceDirection Daia 3 true/faceDirection Jio 1/pause 500/speak Daia "Yes, My lady."/showFrame Jio 23/showFrame Daia 19/playSound shadowpeep/pause 800/warp Jio -100 -100 true/warp Daia -100 -100/emote Belinda 56/speak Belinda "Now, farmer, I've prepared everything for your part.#$b#You, who has blessing of the harvest inherited from your ancestors, are the only one who can appease the crystals of the mountain."/emote farmer 8/speak Belinda "Oh darling, you don't know anything, do you?$h#$b#But that's a story for another time."/faceDirection Belinda 0/pause 500/speak Belinda "See that crystal over there?"/pause 800/faceDirection Belinda 2/speak Belinda "Those are the spiritual crystals that connects the mountain spirit to this world.#$b#And you'd need to offer certain items to those crystals in order to restore their magic back."/emote farmer 16/speak Belinda "Why, yes you heard that right, dear farmer.#$b#That meddlesome voice was the mountain spirit, she who watches over the mountains of this valley.$4#$b#That foolish spirit who stopped my last attempt to open the Spirit realm, now has offered to finally help me.$s#$b#Yes, her.#$b#You'll meet her soon enough.#$b#For now, I need you to offer certain objects to the crystals.#$b#After sealing that mountain spirit in order to get her out of my way, I had to drain out the magic from these gems.#$b#Now, we need to restore that.$h#$b#Problem is, I can only take, not give.$4#$b#And for some reason, only your lineage is able to interact with these crystals properly.#$b#And so, I'm giving this task to you."/emote farmer 16/speak Belinda "Again, yes, you may have a lot of questions now, but those will be answered at a proper time.#$b#All I can say right now is that it all concerns your grandparents.#$b#Oh, those two were such a handful.$4"/emote farmer 28/emote Belinda 56/speak Belinda "Well, dear farmer, I'll leave you to it.#$b#Oh, and one last tip.#$b#These crystals will only accept items that resonate with them.#$b#These are usually objects that have the same color with the crystals so it shouldn't be that hard.#$b#If you have a bit of trouble seeing colors, I've casted a spell to make sure you can only offer items that work on the crystals.#$b#That way, you'd never have to second guess anything.$h#$b#I'm such a caring being, aren't I?$h"/emote farmer 28/speak Belinda "I trust you'll succeed in this simple task, farmer.#$b#Bliss, darling, let's do our part as well."/speak Bliss "Yes, my lady.#$b#I've contacted Helen to notify the troops regarding the search for the remaining artifacts."/faceDirection Belinda 1/emote Belinda 20/speak Belinda "Splendid!$h#$b#That annoying mountain spirit told me we need new artifacts.$4#$b#It couldn't be helped."/faceDirection Belinda 2/pause 800/speak Belinda "See you soon, farmer dear."/pause 300/showFrame Belinda 16/pause 300/playSound wand/screenFlash .8/warp Belinda -100 -100 true/warp Bliss -100 -100/emote farmer 16/pause 1000/end

Entries.75160254/e 75160187: spirits_eve/8 7/farmer 8 12 0 Jio 7 7 1 Daia 8 7 3/skippable/pause 500/emote Daia 56/speak Jio "And those were the Seer's orders?#$b#I assume you finished your task back at that shadowfolk town before coming here."/pause 500/speak Daia "Why, ofcourse!$h#$b#What did you expect from little old me, Jio?$6"/move farmer 0 -2 0/emote farmer 8/faceDirection Daia 2/faceDirection Jio 2/emote Daia 8/speak Jio "@#$b#So, you're still alive after your visit to the forest."/speak Daia "And who's this cutie?$7"/pause 100/showFrame Daia 19/playSound shadowpeep/pause 500/warp Daia 9 10/playSound shadowpeep/pause 500/showFrame Daia 18/pause 300/showFrame Daia 21/emote farmer 12/speak Daia "You seem... Interesting.$6#$b#Let me have a looksie!$h"/faceDirection farmer 1/emote farmer 28/speak Jio "Daia! That's the late farmer's grandchild.#$b#I advise you stop messing around and stick to the mission given to you."/emote Daia 32/showFrame Daia 27/pause 800/speak Daia "I know.$h#$b#I was just having a bit of fun!$h"/faceDirection Daia 3/pause 500/speak Daia "I'm sorry for the scare, cutie.$6"/speak Jio "@, I assume you came here to view my wares in exchange for the spiritual essence you can gather from the ridge forest?"/faceDirection farmer 0/emote farmer 32/speak Jio "That's assuring to hear.#$b#You can browse through my ledger right over there anytime."/jump Daia/speak Daia "Ooh...#$b#The infamous loner of the following is accepting help?$6#$b#Now this place just got a lot more interesting.$h#$b#I'm looking forward to hanging out here for a while then.$h"/speak Jio "I'm simply just utilizing available resource.$a"/speak Daia "Whatever you say, hottie.$h#$b#Now, since farmer-err...#$b#What's your name again?$h"/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection Daia 3/emote farmer 32/speak Daia "@, what a lovely name.$h#$b#Right, so since you're helping that hot elf.#$b#Why don't you help me out too?$7#$b#I have a bunch of minor chores to do around this place.#$b#Can you handle those for me?$6#$b#I promise to make it worth your while.$7"/speak Jio "Daia, stop messing around.$a"/speak Daia "Okay! Okay!$h#$b#But for real though, these tasks were sent specifically for you to do, farmer @.$6#$b#The Seer is interested in you.$7"/emote farmer 8/speak Daia "Who's that?#$b#Oh, you'll meet her soon enough.$h#$b#She said she'll arrive once all preparations are complete.$h"/pause 800/faceDirection Daia 0/speak Daia "I'll lay out the book that's supposed to help you with the tasks, handed to me directly from the Seer herself."/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 800/speak Daia "I'm not sure why you have to do those tasks and how that empty book can help you.#$b#That thing only has blank pages!$h#$b#Or maybe you'll be able to see something we don't."/faceDirection Daia 3/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/speak Daia "But do tell if you find something interesting.$7#$b#I'll give you a sweet reward if you do.$6#$b#Just kidding!$h"/emote farmer 28/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/playSound reward/message "Cult Shop is unlocked!#You received a quest! Check the quest log for more info."/end

17 18/broadcastEvent/skippable/addConversationTopic Naomi_Return/pause 100/move farmer 4 0 1/emote farmer 8/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Lenny "I can't believe you went through all that in the bus, Naomi.$h#$b#But I'm glad you're back."/stopAnimation Lenny 0/emote Naomi 12/speak Naomi "Ugh, It's not funny, Lenny.$a#$b#Now I have to greet my children with a dirty outfit.$s#$b#What would they think of their mother.$s"/emote Richard 32/speak Richard "My dear, You can hand me your suit before we get back to the village.#$b#I'll have it cleaned up in the hotel and return it to you once it's restored.$h#$b#You should go see your children, Naomi.#$b#I'm sure they miss you."/emote Naomi 32/speak Naomi "Thank you, Richard.#$b#It's been so long since I've seen my boys$s#$b#I hope they're farmer 0 -3 0 true/speak Naomi "Good day, young man.#$b#And who might you be?"/speak Richard "Ah, this is @, the new farmer who moved into %farm.$h"/pause 1000/emote farmer 32/speak Naomi "Ah, glad to meet you, farmer.$h#$b#Pardon my appearance.#$b#Some passenger, at the bus I was on commute to go here, spilled their drink all over my suit.$a#$b#People really need to be careful.$a"/emote Lenny 28/emote Naomi 12/speak Naomi "That aside, my name is Naomi, I just came back from a far away city near the northern border of this republic.#$b#My husband and I were working over there to support the family and send money over to our kids.#$b#I believe you've met my boys, Shiro and Yuuma?$h"/emote farmer 32/faceDirection Richard 3/emote Richard 8/speak Richard "How about your husband, Shoto?#$b#He didn't come back home with you?"/faceDirection Naomi 1/pause 400/speak Naomi "Shoto and I discussed a while back that one of us should go home soon.#$b#Shiro was getting better and we were concerned that Yuuma might be taking on too much burden to take care of his brother alone.$s#$b#Ultimately, it was decided that I return, while he continues to work over there to continue support our family."/emote Lenny 56/speak Lenny "Your boys have been well, Naomi. You don't have to worry.$h"/pause 500/speak Naomi "That sounds assuring. Thank you, Lenny."/faceDirection Naomi 2/pause 500/speak Naomi "Now I do think we should get going.#$b#It was nice meeting you, @.$h"/emote farmer 32/faceDirection Naomi 1/pause 500/speak Naomi "By the way, Richard, did you receive the business proposal I've sent through mail a month ago?"/emote Richard 56/speak Richard "Ah! It was a marvelous idea, Naomi.$h#$b#We've just finished all preparations for the hotel as well."/speak Naomi "Excellent.$h#$b#I look forward to working with you, Richard.$h"/emote farmer 8/faceDirection Naomi 2/faceDirection Richard 2/emote Lenny 20/speak Lenny "Oh boy, you're in for a surprise @.$h"/speak Richard "The Log Cabin Hotel has been expanded, young one.$h#$b#Come visit if you have the time.$h"/speak Naomi "Oh yes, I forgot to mention.$h#$b#I work as an Event Planner and have recently partnered up with the Log Cabin Hotel so I can offer my services over there.#$b#I'll personally notify you as soon as everything is ready.#$b#Come visit the hotel soon if you want to reserve an event, okay?$h"/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/speak Naomi "$q 75160249 null "#Would you like to follow them?#$r 75160249 0 naomi_arrive1#Follow them#$r 75160249 0 naomi_arrive2#Stay behind"/fork NaomiAlone/changeLocation Custom_Ridgeside_RSVCliff/warp farmer -100 -100 true/warp Philip 19 17 true/warp Shiro 20 18 true/warp Yuuma 21 18 true/warp Naomi -100 -100 true/faceDirection Naomi 2 true/warp Lenny -100 -100 true/faceDirection Lenny 2 true/warp Richard -100 -100 true/faceDirection Richard 2 true/pause 1000/stopMusic/playMusic summer_day_ambient/fade/viewport 20 21/pause 1000/emote Shiro 28/speak Philip "Alright, just like we practiced, okay?#$b#Yuuma, you don't have to lead Shiro on. Let him do the steps by himself."/speak Yuuma "Okay."/speak Shiro "Phew, let's go."/pause 700/move Shiro 0 1 2 true/move Yuuma 0 1 3 true/pause 700/move Shiro 0 1 2 true/move Yuuma 0 1 3 true/pause 700/move Shiro 0 1 2 true/move Yuuma 0 1 3 true/pause 700/move Shiro 0 1 2 true/move Yuuma 0 1 3 true/pause 700/move Shiro 0 1 2 true/move Yuuma 0 1 3 true/pause 700/emote Shiro 28/emote Philip 32/speak Philip "Great job, Shiro!$h#$b#You're doing so much better compared to our last session.$h"/faceDirection Shiro 0/pause 500/speak Shiro "I'm glad to hear that.$h"/faceDirection Shiro 1/pause 500/speak Shiro "Thanks for helping me out Yu-$h"/emote Shiro 8/emote Yuuma 8/faceDirection Yuuma 1/pause 800/viewport move 3 0 6500/pause 6500/viewport 39 21/pause 600/warp Lenny 39 18/advancedMove Lenny false 0 2 1 0/pause 500/warp Richard 39 18/advancedMove Richard false 0 2 -1 0/pause 1800/faceDirection Lenny 3/animate Lenny false true 300 17 18/faceDirection Richard 1/speak Lenny "Oh don't tell me you're still not used to the cable car, Naomi.$h"/speak Richard "Don't tease her Lenny, We know she hates heights.$h"/warp Naomi 39 18/pause 500/emote Naomi 12/speak Naomi "Sometimes, I question why I even agreed to build a house on top of the mountains.$s"/stopAnimation Lenny 12/move Naomi 0 1 2/pause 800/speak Naomi "Thankfully we're here.#$b#Oh, and Richard, here's the dirtied suit.#$b#Now--"/speak Yuuma "Mom?$4"/emote Naomi 16/stopMusic/faceDirection Richard 2 true/faceDirection Lenny 2/speed Yuuma 4/advancedMove Yuuma false 0 1 18 0 0 -1/pause 250/speak Shiro "Yuuma! Wait!$s"/advancedMove Shiro false 10 0/pause 5000/move Naomi 0 1 2/pause 1000/move Naomi 0 1 2/speak Naomi "Yuuma, my baby...$s"/move Naomi 0 1 2/pause 800/advancedMove Yuuma false -1 0/move Naomi 0 1 3/faceDirection Yuuma 1/pause 200/playMusic desolate/showFrame Yuuma 16/showFrame Naomi 16/positionOffset Yuuma 10 0/positionOffset Naomi -14 10/speak Naomi "My sweet boy...$4#$b#Oh, how I missed you...$4"/speak Yuuma "Mom... I missed you.$4#$b#Mom... Mommy...$4"/speak Naomi "Shush, sweetie...$4#$b#I'm here now... Okay?$4#$b#It must have been hard for you... I'm sorry...$4"/move Shiro 6 0 1/pause 800/faceDirection Yuuma 1/positionOffset Naomi 14 -10/faceDirection Naomi 3/pause 500/speak Naomi "Shiro...$4#$b#I--$4"/speak Shiro "I'm sorry, Mom...$u#$b#I caused our family so much trouble...$u#$b#Mom... I...$u"/advancedMove Yuuma false 0 -1/pause 800/faceDirection Yuuma 2/move Naomi -2 0 3/showFrame Naomi 16/animate Shiro true true 300 16 16/positionOffset Naomi -14 0/pause 800/speak Naomi "I missed you, my son...$4#$b#Don't worry about anything, okay?$4#$b#I'm just happy to know you're doing better.$4#$b#Your father is too... He misses you both... But he'd be happy to know that you're both alright...$4"/pause 800/speak Shiro "I missed you guys...$u"/pause 1000/stopAnimation Shiro 4/faceDirection Naomi 3/pause 500/speak Yuuma "Uhm... Mom? Where's Dad?"/faceDirection Naomi 0/emote Naomi 28/speak Naomi "Your dad had to stay behind for the meantime.$s#$b#But don't worry, we can call him later.$h#$b#For now, let's head home, okay?#$b#It's been a long day.$h"/pause 1000/end
Entries.NaomiAlone: pause 500/message "I bet Shiro and Yuuma will be happy to see their mom again."/end

Entries.75160250/H/t 600 900/e 75160249: continue/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 Naomi 64 18 0/addMailReceived RSV.UnlockHotelExpansion/pause 1000/emote farmer 8/emote Naomi 32/speak Naomi "I'm sorry for visiting so early @.#$b#But I did promise that I'll notify you when the hotel expansion is complete.$h"/emote farmer 16/speak Naomi "I'm glad you seem delighted.$h#$b#Richard has also partnered with Malaya Liden. She has established a cafe at the hotel lobby as well.#$b#It seems like you have more service options to explore in the village now.$h#$b#Come visit when you have time.#$b#As this town's mayor, Lewis, has stated; 'A part of tourism revenue of Ridgeside goes to Pelican Town'$s#$b#Though to be honest, with how fast Ridgeside is developing, it may one day become an independent town.$h#$b#And I'm pretty sure those siblings are worrying about that.$h#$b#Lewis being envious and Lenny being afraid of more paperwork and responsibilities.$h#$b#Oh, how this valley still manages to be sustainable must be a miracle, especially being under those two.$s"/emote farmer 28/pause 1000/end

Let me think...#$b#Maybe we could..."/move Kimpoi 0 -1 0/faceDirection Malaya 0/pause 1000/faceDirection Kimpoi 1/pause 1000/faceDirection Kimpoi 2/pause 1000/faceDirection Kimpoi 3/pause 1000/faceDirection Kimpoi 0/pause 1000/emote Kimpoi 40/speak Kimpoi "Hm..."/move Kimpoi 0 1 3/faceDirection Malaya 1/pause 800/speak Malaya "Well?"/speak Kimpoi "Yep, we're lost."/emote Malaya 28/speak Malaya "I hope someone passes by so we can ask for directions...$s"/faceDirection Kimpoi 2/move Malaya 0 3 2/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 1000/faceDirection Malaya 1/pause 1000/faceDirection Malaya 0/pause 1000/faceDirection Malaya 3/pause 800/emote Malaya 16/speak Malaya "Oh! Thank you.$h"/move farmer 2 0 1/faceDirection Malaya 2/emote farmer 8/speak Malaya "Oh, no we're not tourists.$h#$b#We just haven't returned for a long time.$s"/speak Kimpoi "We were travelling around the world.#$b#For reasons...$s"/emote farmer 32/speak Malaya "Oh, yes! The cable car.#$b#So, could you guide us there?$s#$b#We're really sorry to bother you.$s"/emote farmer 56/advancedMove farmer false 0 -5/advancedMove Malaya false 0 -5/advancedMove Kimpoi false 0 -5/pause 1500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeToTemporaryMap Custom_Ridgeside_RSVCableCar/warp farmer 20 16/warp Kimpoi 19 17/warp Malaya 21 17/fade/viewport 20 10/pause 100/advancedMove Kimpoi false 0 -5 1 0/advancedMove Malaya false 0 -5/move farmer 0 -3 0/pause 2000/speak Malaya "Ah! So this is where it was!$h#$b#Thank you so much!"/faceDirection Kimpoi 2/faceDirection Malaya 2/speak Malaya "Oh, I'm sorry. We forgot to introduce ourselves.#$b#My name's Malaya, and this here is my husband, Kimpoi"/speak Kimpoi "It's a pleasure to meet you.$h"/emote farmer 32/speak Kimpoi "Oh, you're @?#$b#So you're the new farmer who moved into the valley.#$b#My sister mentioned you in one of her letters.$h"/emote farmer 56/speak Malaya "You've been really helpful, @.$h#$b#We really appreciate it!$h#$b#It's quite embarassing really, forgetting the whereabouts of our own hometown.$h"/emote farmer 32/speak Kimpoi "Alright then, I think we better go.#$b#See you around, @.$h"/advancedMove Kimpoi false 0 -3/advancedMove Malaya false -1 0 0 -2/pause 500/speak Olga "So you're telling me; You let go of the plate you were washing because you were excited for a phone call from some lottery?$a#$b#Now tell me? How much did you win? Will it cover the shattered plate? The plate that I told you is my favorite plate?!$a"/emote Malaya 8 true/emote Kimpoi 8 true/speak Bert "Now hun, Uh-$s"/speak Olga "Correction... WAS my favorite plate!$a#$b#It's long gone, HUN.$a#$b#Shattered!$a#$b#All for the measly 20$ you won over the lottery!$a"/warp Olga 20 7/advancedMove Olga false 0 1/speak Olga "And the lottery ticket costed 25$! HUN WHY--$a"/jump Olga/jump Kimpoi/emote Olga 16 true/emote Kimpoi 16/speak Olga "Hey! Watch where you--$a#$b#!!!$u"/speak Kimpoi "Ollie?$u#$b#Sis?!$u"/speak Bert "Hey, what's the hold up?"/advancedMove Olga false 1 0/advancedMove Malaya false 1 0/warp Bert 20 7/advancedMove Bert false 0 1/advancedMove Kimpoi false 0 1/pause 800/faceDirection Kimpoi 0/faceDirection Olga 2 true/faceDirection Malaya 0 true/speak Bert "What's goin' on?$u"/speak Malaya "Hey... Olga, Bert...$7"/emote Olga 16/emote Bert 16/speak Olga "!!!$u"/speak Bert "Smokin' horses, you two!$u#$b#You're back!$h"/emote Kimpoi 28/speak Kimpoi "We're sorry we didn't inform you ahead, Ollie.#$b#We were kind of--$s"/advancedMove Olga false 0 1 -2 0 0 1/pause 1000/faceDirection Kimpoi 3/faceDirection Malaya 3/faceDirection Olga 1/speak Olga "I have so much... So much to tell and scold you about, big brother.$a#$b#But... Not now."/speak Kimpoi "Ollie? Hey why are your lips trembling?$s#$b#Are you oka--$s"/showFrame Olga 16/positionOffset Olga 30 0/message "Olga hugged Kimpoi"/emote Kimpoi 16/speak Olga "I missed you, you big oaf.$h"/emote Kimpoi 60/speak Kimpoi "Ollie...$4"/faceDirection Olga 1/positionOffset Olga -30 0/pause 800/speak Olga "It's nice seeing you too, Malaya.#$b#How are your legs doing?$h#$b#Getting used to those yet?$h#$b#Missing your fi--$h"/speak Malaya "Olga!$u#$b#Shush!$u#$b#We're not alone!$u"/emote Olga 16/faceDirection Olga 2/pause 500/speak Olga "Oh! @! Didn't see you there!$u#$b#You heard nothing.$h#$b#Oh! And I guess you've met them?$h"/emote farmer 32/faceDirection Kimpoi 2/faceDirection Malaya 2/speak Malaya "@ here guided us to where the cable car was.#$b#We sort of forgot the where-abouts.$7"/speak Kimpoi "Well, it's been so long."/faceDirection Olga 1/emote Olga 16/speak Olga "On that topic, it's been so long since your daughter saw you two!$a#$b#You both should hurry up and go to her!$a"/faceDirection Kimpoi 3/faceDirection Malaya 3/speak Malaya "How's our sweet baby girl?$s#$b#I-I don't know how to approach her now...$s"/speak Kimpoi "Ali...$s"/jump Olga/speak Olga "Stop sulking and go to her!$a"/emote Kimpoi 16 true/emote Malaya 16/faceDirection Malaya 2 true/faceDirection Kimpoi 2/speak Malaya "Oh! Yes! We have to go!$u#$b#Thank you once again, @.$h"/faceDirection Kimpoi 1/faceDirection Malaya 3/speak Kimpoi "Let's go meet our daughter."/emote Malaya 60/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/message "They headed off to Ridgeside Village."/changeLocation BusStop/speak Malaya "$q 75160251 null "#Would you like to follow them?#$r 75160251 0 lidens_arrive1#Follow them#$r 75160251 0 lidens_arrive2#Stay behind"/fork LidensAlone/pause 1000/changeToTemporaryMap Custom_Ridgeside_RidgesideVillage/stopMusic/warp farmer -100 -100/warp Malaya 22 100/faceDirection Malaya 0/warp Bert 20 98/faceDirection Bert 1/warp Olga 22 98/faceDirection Olga 2/warp Kimpoi 20 100/faceDirection Kimpoi 1/playMusic 50s/fade/viewport 25 98/pause 800/shake Malaya 1000/emote Kimpoi 28 true/emote Olga 56/speak Olga "What are you two nervous about?$a#$b#She's right in there! Go on! $h#$b#Why are you two hiding here?$h"/emote Malaya 28/speak Malaya "Olga, it's been so long.$s#$b#We left her to you 9 years ago.$s#$b#I still remember her crying her heart out as we departed.$s#$b#I don't know how to approach her...$s"/speak Kimpoi "We weren't able to tell her the truth before.$s#$b#But I think we should soon, dear.$s"/faceDirection Malaya 3/emote Malaya 28/speak Malaya "Someday, hun...$s"/jump Olga/speak Olga "You two will figure that out eventually.#$b#But for now, you shouldn't be afraid of meeting her after all these years.$h#$b#I'm sure she misses you both so much."/faceDirection Malaya 0/faceDirection Kimpoi 0/pause 500/speak Bert "Don't you both worry.$h#$b#I'm sure lil' Alissa would understand the both of you."/pause 500/speak Malaya "Thank you, you two.#$b#I just can't stop being nervou-$s"/stopMusic/speak Alissa "Okay... take two...$s#$b#I hope this new song sounds alright with the higher octave.$s"/emote Kimpoi 8 true/emote Malaya 8/faceDirection Olga 0/pause 1000/playMusic cm:AlissaSerenade/pause 3000/speak Malaya "Is that?...$7"/speak Olga "Your daughter's voice is magical, isn't it?$h#$b#You don't know how proud our family is of her.$h"/speak Kimpoi "Our little Ali...$4"/advancedMove Malaya false -1 0/speak Malaya "Dear...$6#$b#That's our daughter...$6"/pause 5000/stopMusic/speak Alissa "Phew. I think I need breather!$h"/pause 1000/warp Alissa 27 94/playSound doorClose/faceDirection Malaya 1/emote Olga 32/emote Alissa 8/faceDirection Alissa 2/jump Alissa/emote Alissa 16/speak Alissa "Auntie!?#u#$b#What are you doing here?$a#$b#Don't tell me you and uncle Bert are snooping around while I sing, again.$s#$b#It's embarassing...$s"/speak Olga "Oh, I don't think your uncle and I are alone this time.$h"/emote Alissa 16/speak Alissa "More people heard that!?$u"/advancedMove Malaya false 6 0 0 -1/advancedMove Kimpoi false 6 0 0 -1/speak Alissa "This is really embarassi--$s#$b#!!!$u"/emote Alissa 16/speak Malaya "H-Hi... My dear...$6"/pause 1000/move Alissa 0 1 2/pause 1000/speak Alissa "Mo-Mom?...$s"/move Malaya 0 -1 0/move Kimpoi 0 -1 0/speak Kimpoi "Our little Ali...$4"/move Alissa 0 1 2/speak Alissa "Mom... Dad...$l"/move Alissa 0 1 2/move Malaya 0 -1 0/warp Alissa -100 -100/showFrame Malaya 26/playMusic desolate/speak Malaya "Oh, my Alissa...$6#$b#My dear Alissa...$6#$b#You've grown so much...$6"/move Kimpoi 0 -1 1/speak Kimpoi "We...$4"/speak Malaya "We're really sorry for leaving you behind all those years ago...$8#$b#We're really sorry...$8"/speak Alissa "Mom...$l#$b#It's alright... I'm sure you had your reasons...$7#$b#I'm just happy you're both back...$l"/pause 2000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/speak Malaya "We have a lot of catching up to do.$6#$b#You sang beautifully, my dear!$6"/speak Alissa "Mom! You guys heard that too!$u#$b#This is really embarassing...$s"/end
Entries.LidensAlone: pause 500/message "I bet the Lidens will have a wonderful reunion"/end

Entries.75160261/e 75160259/t 2400 2600/f Bliss: nightTime/39 19/farmer -100 -100 0 Raeriyala 40 17 3 Belinda 38 17 1/skippable/pause 500/emote Raeriyala 40/emote Belinda 40/speak Raeriyala "Despite you sealing me out.$s#$b#I just couldn't get it in me to get mad at you, Bel.$4"/speak Belinda "Silence, Rae.$a#$b#I had to seal you so you won't get in my way of opening the portal!$a#$b#You kept being against it, saying that it's for my own good and everything.$a#$b#Why didn't you just let me just do what I wanted to do?!$a#$b#You do know it's for you, right? So that I can cleanse that acursed land we once called home!$a#$b#So that this mountain is cleansed, and you won't have to bear with the burden of keeping those evil creatures away from these humans alone.$a#$b#I could do that all alone!$a"/speak Raeriyala "And what, Bel? I lose you?$a#$b#We both know the price if another spirit enters the realm while it's under Gabriella's control.$s#$b#Especially you, who was once one of her--$s"/glow 255 0 0/playSound wand/speak Belinda "DON'T!$a"/pause 1000/speak Raeriyala "Belinda...$s"/faceDirection Belinda 0/pause 1000/emote Belinda 40/speak Belinda "I just...$s#$b#I just wish to save you, Rae...$s#$b#Even avenge our old friend, the late farmer's wife...$s#$b#She didn't have to...$s"/move Raeriyala -1 0 3/speak Raeriyala "We both miss her...$s#$b#But I don't think she'll be happy seeing her friends fight like this.$4#$b#Right?$4"/pause 1000/faceDirection Belinda 1/emote Belinda 28/speak Belinda "Why, yes.$4#$b#She won't.$4#$b#Oh, how I missed you, my beloved.$4"/speak Raeriyala "And as do I, love.$4#$b#All I know is... Things are getting better...$h#$b#And everything else will be, eventually.$h"/emote Belinda 20/emote Raeriyala 20/pause 3000/end
Entries.75160260: continue/39 19/farmer 39 27 0 Raeriyala -100 -100 2/pause 500/move farmer 0 -6 0/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 500/emote farmer 8/message "Looking for me, Oh farmer?"/emote farmer 16/glow 0 255 0/playSound healSound/screenFlash .8/warp Raeriyala 39 17/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 800/emote Raeriyala 56/speak Raeriyala "I reside everywhere in the mountain as the force that drives flora and fauna forward, Oh @.$h#$b#But if you ever need to talk to me, you can do so by offering anything into these waters.#$b#Just stand at the edge over there."/move farmer 0 -1 0/emote Raeriyala 32/speak Raeriyala "That's right.$h#$b#Then just hold up an item and interact with the water.#$b#Please do bring proper offerings, okay @?$4#$b#Such offerings make me really happy!$h#$b#Who knows? I might even tell you interesting stories about specific items.#$b#Or even give you blessings from some lovely offerings!$h#$b#I look forward to seeing you soon, oh @.$h"/emote farmer 32/pause 500/end
