Entries.75160262/H/e 75160256: cm:AweAmbience/15 43/farmer 15 48 0 Raeriyala 16 42 2 Belinda 14 42 2 Bliss 12 41 1 Helen 14 39 2 Jio 18 40 2 Daia 19 41 3/broadcastEvent/addConversationTopic RSV.OngoingSpiritRealm 3/pause 500/move farmer 0 -2 0/emote farmer 28/speak Raeriyala "Are you alright, oh farmer?$4#$b#That blast was unexpected. But I'm glad everyone's safe.$h"/speak Belinda "Oh my.#$b#The relics we used this time must be powerful.#$b#I'd like to take a look at these soon."/faceDirection Belinda 1/pause 800/speak Belinda "But first, we have to get rid of the corruption in the Spirit realm.#$b#We will go ahead-$h"/emote Raeriyala 16/faceDirection Raeriyala 3/speak Raeriyala "Bel!$a#$b#We both know you can't do that!$a#$b#Not even your followers might not be able to stand the corruption's influence.$s"/faceDirection Raeriyala 2/pause 800/speak Raeriyala "Only her descendant can venture there.$a"/emote farmer 16/faceDirection Belinda 2/emote Belinda 40/speak Belinda "Fine.$a#$b#Farmer! I'll entrust everything to you.$a"/emote farmer 28/move Raeriyala 0 1 2/speak Raeriyala "Oh, farmer. Listen well.#$b#The spirit realm would be tricky to navigate through.$a#$b#Touching a crystal will teleport you to another one. So it's best to take note of which crystal goes where.$a#$b#Belinda and I have casted a spell to create crystals that link this world to the spirit realm as well.#$b#They should look different from the other crystals and touching them will take you back here."/emote farmer 32/move Belinda 0 1 2/speak Belinda "Pay attention, farmer.$a#$b#The realm should currently be corrupted by Gabriella.$a#$b#That wretched witch would've twisted most spirits in that realm as well, making them hostile.$a#$b#Not to mention, sending some of her minions over there too.$a#$b#Be careful!$a"/pause 500/faceDirection Raeriyala 3/speak Raeriyala "Now, how will @ cleanse the corruption?$s"/faceDirection Belinda 1/pause 800/speak Belinda "Gabriella must've used some kind of medium to amplify her magic.$a#$b#And there should be a number of them.$a"/faceDirection Belinda 2/faceDirection Raeriyala 2/speak Belinda "Your grandmother mentioned seeing purple flames on top of five mountains.$a#$b#That was the only thing she mentioned after returning, long ago.$s#$b#Those might be the mediums. Find a way to reach those and extinguish the flames.$a#$b#Getting rid of of those might cleanse the corruption.$a"/emote farmer 32/speak Raeriyala "We'll continue to protect the valley from here, oh farmer.#$b#Good luck!$h"/speak Belinda "Make your grandmother proud."/emote farmer 32/pause 500/end position 15 47
Entries.75160265/H/e 75160264: cm:AweAmbience/39 24/farmer 39 26 0 Belinda 38 23 1 Raeriyala 40 23 3 Bliss 37 26 1 Jio -100 -100 0 Daia -100 -100 0/broadcastEvent/showFrame Jio 23/showFrame Daia 19/pause 500/move farmer 0 -2 0/pause 1000/faceDirection Raeriyala 2/faceDirection Belinda 2/emote Raeriyala 20/emote Belinda 32/speak Raeriyala "Oh, farmer!$4#$b#You did it!$h#$b#The corruption has been stopped!#$b#This land is now out of Gabriella's grasp.$h#$b#We're so happy! We are eternally grateful to you.$4"/emote farmer 32/speak Belinda "There would still be some stranded monsters and twisted spirits in the forests though.$s#$b#But we can handle that ourselves.#$b#You made your grandmother proud, dear farmer.$4#$b#Thank you.$4"/speak Bliss "Thank you, @.$h"/emote farmer 32/playSound healSound/glow 255 255 255/emote farmer 16 true/emote Belinda 16 true/emote Raeriyala 16 true/emote Bliss 16/faceDirection Belinda 0/faceDirection Raeriyala 0/playSound healSound/glow 255 255 255/pause 500/playSound boulderBreak/pause 500/playSound boulderBreak/pause 500/playSound boulderBreak/message "You hear a rumbling sound from the distance."/emote Raeriyala 56/speak Raeriyala "The mountain is slowly healing.$h#$b#The summit must've finally showed itself after all these years.$4"/emote Belinda 8/faceDirection Belinda 1/faceDirection Raeriyala 3/speak Belinda "The summit?#$b#It sounds familiar."/speak Raeriyala "A long lost forgotten farm resides there.#$b#When the corruption started, that place got stranded as I tried to contain Gabriella's magic.$s#$b#Unfortunately, I wasn't able to save the old couple that lived there...$s"/speak Belinda "You did what you had to do, my love.$s#$b#They were atleast saved from the corruption.$4"/speak Raeriyala "Thank you, love.$4#$b#I shall pray over their souls once again soon.$4"/faceDirection Belinda 2/faceDirection Raeriyala 2/emote Raeriyala 28/speak Raeriyala "I'm sorry for such a sad story in this time of victory, everyone.$4#$b#Oh farmer, thank you, once again.$4"/emote farmer 32/speak Raeriyala "Oh, farmer!#$b#If you have time, can you visit this mountain's summit for me?$4#$b#Please just check upon the old couple up there.$4#$b#They must've had a hard life.$s"/emote farmer 56/speak Raeriyala "Thank you, oh farmer.$4#$b#Oh! The spirits seem to have given you a gift!$h#$b#The crystals all over this mountain seem to emanate more spiritual energy compared to before.#$b#You should look into those as well.$h"/playSound shadowpeep/warp Jio 38 28 true/warp Daia 40 28/pause 500/faceDirection Daia 0 true/faceDirection Jio 0/emote Daia 32/move Daia 0 -1 0/speak Daia "My lady!$h#$b#I just heard the news!$h"/emote farmer 8/faceDirection farmer 0/emote Belinda 56/speak Belinda "Now, we may have won the battle this time.#$b#But I doubt Gabriella settled to only corrupt this valley.$a#$b#We must find her and put an end to her.$a#$b#Let's continue our search for her, my children.$4"/speak Jio "Yes, my lady."/speak Daia "Agreed, our Seer."/speak Bliss "We'll do our best, my lady."/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Belinda "Splendid!$h#$b#I'll meet you all soon enough.#$b#For now, I have an important task to attend to.$4"/faceDirection Raeriyala 3/emote Raeriyala 8/faceDirection Belinda 1/speak Raeriyala "My love, are you still investigating that mysterious man?$s#$b#Be careful. He doesn't seem to be just a mere mortal.$a"/speak Belinda "He's an anomaly, Rae.$a#$b#And he seems to know who I was before I became a corrupted spirit.$a#$b#I must find that blue-skinned man.$a"/speak Raeriyala "I understand.$4#$b#Just make sure to visit here soon enough, alright?$4#$b#And please let's not fight anymore when you do. I don't want to get sealed again.$h"/emote Belinda 32/speak Belinda "My! That brought back memories!$h#$b#I'll see you soon, love.$4"/faceDirection Belinda 2/pause 500/speak Belinda "Bliss, darling. Let's go.#$b#Jio. Daia. I leave cleaning up the ridge to the both of you."/speak Jio "As you wish, my Lady."/speak Daia "I'm just happy to hang around here more often!$h"/speak Bliss "Yes, my lady.#$b#See you soon, farmer."/faceDirection farmer 2/emote farmer 32/showFrame Belinda 16/pause 800/playSound wand/screenFlash .8/warp Belinda -100 -100/warp Bliss -100 -100/faceDirection farmer 0/move Raeriyala -1 0 2/speak Raeriyala "And I'll be off as well, humans and elf.$h#$b#Feel free to give an offering here anytime, okay?$h#$b#See you soon, oh farmer.$4"/playSound healSound/glow 0 255 0/screenFlash .8/warp Raeriyala -100 -100/pause 800/move Daia 0 -3 3/speak Daia "Yoohoo, cutie!$4"/emote farmer 8/faceDirection farmer 1/emote Daia 56/speak Daia "It looks like Jio and I will be staying her in this valley for a while.$h#$b#So, I hope we can be friends.$6#$b#Or maybe more?$7#$b#Teehee! I'm just messing around!$h"/emote farmer 28/speak Daia "Seriously though, Thank you for all you've done.#$b#All of us that follow the Lady have our reasons why we want to cleanse the corruption and open the spirit realm.$s#$b#And what you've done has contributed positively towards our personal goals.$9#$b#Thank you.$h"/emote farmer 32/emote Daia 56/speak Daia "Well, I'll see you when I see you!$h#$b#Come visit the old cottage when you can! Okay?$h#$b#Bye, cutie!$6"/playSound shadowpeep/showFrame Daia 19/pause 500/warp Daia -100 -100/emote Jio 40/speak Jio "@."/emote farmer 8/faceDirection farmer 2/move Jio 1 0 0/move Jio 0 -2 0/pause 800/speak Jio "Just like what Daia said, we all have our personal goals and reasons why we follow the Lady.#$b#In my case, I'm really grateful, @.#$b#Thank you.$h"/emote farmer 32/speak Jio "If you ever need help, we'll come to your aid.#$b#Visit the cottage anytime. We can also relay our group's quests there if you want some challenge.$h"/emote farmer 28/speak Jio "Farewell."/showFrame Jio 23/playSound shadowpeep/pause 500/warp Jio -100 -100/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/playSound achievement/message "A new location has been revealed on top of the west mountain!#Jio and Daia can now be romanced!#New quests and pages are added to the Ninja House!#The crystals all over the mountain have turned into portals!"/pause 700/end
